products.description: For customers looking for a simple, no frills home loan with low upfront fees and no ongoing fees (MSF).
products.name: Bendigo Easy Home Loan

products.description: Commercial Term Loan requiring first mortgage security. Borrowers can choose from Interest Only, Principal and Interest, with variable and fixed rate options.
products.name: Commercial Loan

products.description:
The Regional First Home Buyer Guarantee (RFHBG) is a Federal Government initiative to support eligible borrowers to purchase their first home in Regional Australia, with as little as a 5% deposit.

The Regional First Home Buyer Guarantee mirrors the Bendigo Complete Home Loan offering a 100% offset account on both variable and fixed rates - allowing you to save interest.   

* Check Eligibility Criteria for Scheme Loans
products.name: Regional First Home Buyer Guarantee (Bendigo Complete Home Loan)

products.description:
The Family Home Guarantee is now available to single legal guardians of children, for example aunts, uncles and grandparents. 

The Family Home Guarantee mirrors the Bendigo Complete Home Loan offering a 100% offset account on both variable and fixed rates - allowing you to save interest.   

* Check Eligibility Criteria for Scheme Loans
products.name: Family Home Guarantee (Bendigo Complete Home Loan)

products.description: The Bendigo Express is an online home loan which enables a customer to apply and be approved for a home loan digitally. The application form will be hosted by our partner Tic Toc.
products.name: Bendigo Express Home Loan

products.description:
The First Home Guarantee is now available to Australian permanent residents, as well as people who have not owned property in Australia in the last 10 years. Joint applications will also now be accepted from friends and family members – it’s no longer limited to only single applicants, married or de facto couples.

The First Home Guarantee mirrors the Bendigo Complete Home Loan offering a 100% offset account on both variable and fixed rates - allowing you to save interest.   

* Check Eligibility Criteria for Scheme Loans
products.name: First Home Guarantee (Bendigo Complete Home Loan)

products.description: Platinum Rewards Credit Card lets you earn points as you shop, which you can redeem online for a huge range of goods and services. With a range of added insurances, purchase protections, plus access to Mastercard Priceless Cities exclusive experiences and special offers, it's the only card you'll need. Plus you'll receive up to 55 days interest free on purchases.
products.name: Platinum Rewards Credit Card

products.description: Ensure you have enough money to get you through the festive season.
products.name: Bendigo Christmas Club Account

products.description: With one of the lowest annual fees in the market, and a range of insurances, the Qantas Business Credit Card will help your points soar. You will also receive up to 55 days interest free on purchases.
products.name: Qantas Business Credit Card

products.description:
Works like a finance lease and is designed specifically for employee motor vehicles that form part of a salary package arrangement.
100% finance of the purchase price (deposits not permitted).
We own the vehicle and at the end of the term you may make an offer to purchase.
Repayments made by your employer out of your pre-tax salary.
A mandatory residual at the end of the term means you will have lower rental instalments.
products.name: Novated Lease

products.description:
We purchase and own the asset, and you buy it from us in instalments over an agreed period. Upon final payment ownership of the asset transfers to you.
Usually no deposit is required.
We own the asset however you may be entitled to claim GST input tax credits, depreciation and interest expenses.
Flexible and tailored repayment structures depending on your cash flow needs.
A balloon payment can be included at the end of the term.
products.name: Asset Purchase

products.description: Bendigo Bank’s range of term deposits offer great rates so you can watch your money grow.  Additional deposits at any time and withdrawals of up to 25% of your original deposit if you need to at any Bendigo Branch.
products.name: Gold Term Deposit

products.description: This clever transaction account is designed to help you earn while you learn.  It's available to full time students, apprentices and trainees.
products.name: Bendigo Student Account

products.description: For customers who want flexibility to pay down their loan sooner and access additional features such as offset accounts.
products.name: Bendigo Flex Home Loan

products.description: A line of credit providing you access to cash (to approved limit) when needed to support business cash flow requirements.
products.name: Line of Credit

products.description: Earn an attractive interest rate no matter how much you save or how much you transact.
products.name: Bendigo EasySaver

products.description: Designed for kids under 12. Fun and rewarding way to introduce them to saving.
products.name: Bendigo PiggySaver

products.description:
If you have a 5% deposit, the Victorian Government will contribute up to 25% of the purchase price for eligible participants and 35% for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders in exchange for an equivalent share in the property, whilst removing the need for Lenders Mortgage Insurance.

We’re proud to be a participating lender and look forward to helping even more Victorians into home ownership.

The Victorian Homebuyer Fund (VHF) mirrors the Bendigo Complete Home Loan offering a 100% offset account on both variable and fixed rates - allowing you to save interest.   

* Check Eligibility Criteria for Scheme Loans
products.name: Victorian Homebuyer Fund (Bendigo Complete Home Loan)

products.description: Where a customer is purchasing a residential investment loan and they are a non-trading corporate entity or a trust with a corporate trustee, the NIRIL might be the product for them, provided that they fit the criteria.
products.name: Non-Individual Residential Investment Loan (NIRIL)

products.description: The Bendigo Complete Home Loan offers a 100% offset account on both variable and fixed rates - allowing you to save interest
products.name: Bendigo Complete Home Loan

products.description: A Bridging home loan offers you an easy way to purchase a new home before you sell your existing home.
products.name: Bendigo Bridging Home Loan

products.description:
The NSW Government will ease that burden for eligible applicants with the launch of the NSW Shared Equity Home Buyer Helper on 23 January 2023. 

The NSW Shared Equity Home Buyer Helper (SEHBH) mirrors the Bendigo Complete Home Loan offering a 100% offset account on both variable and fixed rates - allowing you to save interest.   

* Check Eligibility Criteria for Scheme Loans
products.name: NSW Shared Equity Home Buyer Helper (Bendigo Complete Home Loan)

products.description: Bendigo Ready Credit Card lets you enjoy a $0 annual fee - this year and beyond. Also, save with $0 international transaction fees, a range of added insurances, purchase protections, plus access to Mastercard Priceless Cities exclusive experiences and special offers - it's the only card you'll need. Plus you'll receive up to 55 days interest free on purchases.
products.name: Bendigo Ready Credit Card

products.description: As a business owner, keeping track of expenses is important and can be time consuming. Get visibility of your expenses and stay in control with the Business Credit Card. You will also receive up to 44 days interest free on purchases.
products.name: Business Credit Card

products.description: You own the asset and purchase it with a loan, using the equipment as security. Usually no deposit is required. As you own the asset, you may be entitled to claim GST input tax credits, depreciation and interest expenses. Flexible and tailored repayment structures depending on your cash flow needs. A balloon payment may be included at the end of the term depending on the asset age and type.
products.name: Equipment Loan

products.description: With one of the lowest annual fees in the market, and a competitive interest rate, make every day purchases using your Qantas Platinum Credit Card and watch your points soar. Plus, you will also receive up to 55 days interest fee on purchase.
products.name: Qantas Platinum Credit Card

products.description:
We purchase and own the asset and lease it to you for an agreed period. You may make an offer to purchase the asset at the end of the term. 100% finance of the purchase price (deposits not permitted).
We own the asset and normally the entire rental payment is tax deductable for you.
Flexible and tailored repayment structures depending on your cash flow needs.
A mandatory residual at the end of the term means you will benefit from lower rental instalments.
products.name: Finance Lease
